meanings.definition: A type of cancer that begins in cells of the immune system called lymphocytes.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed him with lymphoma after finding abnormal lymphocytes.
meanings.sent2: She underwent chemotherapy to treat her lymphoma.
meanings.sent3: Despite its name, lymphoma doesn't involve actual lymph or foam.
meanings.sent4: The lymphoma spread like wildfire through his body, unstoppable.
meanings.sent5: The image of lymphoma cells attacking the immune system is terrifying.

meanings.definition: A malignant tumor that arises in the lymph nodes or in other lymphoid tissue.
meanings.sent1: Her lymphoma was detected early during a routine check-up.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon successfully removed the lymphoma from his lymph nodes.
meanings.sent3: The lymphoma in the lymph nodes seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The growth of lymphoma in her body mirrored a tangled web of branches.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained how lymphoma forms in the lymph nodes like a dark shadow.
